DOC.brief_summary: This Phase I Dose-Escalation Study BMS641988 Patients Castration-Resistant Prostate Cancer .
DOC.brief_title: A Phase I Dose-Escalation Study BMS-641988 Patients With Castration-Resistant Prostate Cancer
DOC.criteria: Advanced castrationresistant prostate carcinoma progressive disease At least 4 week must elapse major surgery Patient must available followup Adequate liver kidney function Adequate blood value Uncontrolled significant heart disease History seizures History head injury , loss consciousness , stroke Patients undergo alcohol withdrawal Any concurrent cancer A serious uncontrolled medical disorder active infection Inability swallow tablet
